environmentName.description: The name of the environment to add.
environmentName.x-prompt: What is the name of the environment you want to add?

subscriptionId.description: The Azure subscription this environment will use.

resourceGroupName.description: The Azure resource group this environment will use (defaults to `${prefix}-rg-${environment}-${workloadName}`).

skipEnvironmentCreation.description: Opts out of workload environment creation in Azure (rg, vnet, snet, kv), note rg will still be created if storage type is azure storage

keyVaultName.description: The name of the key vault containing this environment's secrets (defaults to `${prefix}-kv-${environment}-${workloadName}`).

vnetName.description: The name of the virtual network to create (defaults to `${prefix}-vnet-${environment}-${workloadName}`).

metadata.description: Specifies the name of the subnet for the environment (defaults to `${prefix}-snet-${environment}-${workloadName}`).
Specifies the address prefix of the virtual network for the environment.
Specifies the address prefix of the subnet for the environment.
Specifies the name of the private link to key vault.

location.description: The Azure location to use for the environment.

tenantId.description: The Azure tenant ID to use for the environment (for RBAC).

azureLogLevel.description: The Azure ARM log level to use when executing the generator.

tfStorageAccountName.description: The storage account to store the state in (defaults to `${prefix}${environment}tfstore${workloadName}`) if workload configured to use azure storage.

containerName.description: The storage account container to store the state in if using azure storage for tf state.

tfWorkspaceName.description: The Hashicorp Cloud Hosted Terraform workspace name (defaults to `${workloadName}-${environmentName}`) if workload configured to use terraform cloud.
